mapper.insert: insert into portfolio (port_id, port_exp, port_skill, port_interest, port_award, port_link, port_license, port_img, user_id) values(#{port_id}, #{port_exp}, #{port_skill},#{port_interest}, #{port_award}, #{port_link}, #{port_license}, #{port_img}, #{user_id})
mapper.select: select port_id, port_exp, port_skill, port_interest, port_award, port_link, port_license, port_img, user_id from portfolio where port_id=#{port_id}
select * from portfolio order by port_id desc
select port_id, port_exp, port_skill, port_interest, port_award, port_link, port_license, port_img, user_id from portfolio where user_id=#{use_id} order by port_id desc
